plot: Saravanan, a civil engineer, decides to start his own construction company. He arranges money and buys land from Sastri, a real-estate broker. Only later does he realize that Sastri is an untraceable fraud and that the land is not his own.
title: Poriyaalan
plot_es: Saravanan, a civil engineer, decides to start his own construction company. He arranges money and buys land from Sastri, a real-estate broker. Only later does he realize that Sastri is an untraceable fraud and that the land is not his own.
plot_en: Saravanan, a civil engineer, decides to start his own construction company. He arranges money and buys land from Sastri, a real-estate broker. Only later does he realize that Sastri is an untraceable fraud and that the land is not his own.
